##6.5.1
Getting a sense of the data, Hitters
```{r}
dim(Hitters)
colnames(Hitters)
glimpse(Hitters)
summary(Hitters)
```

Dropping rows that are missing the salary value. Base R uses na.omit.
```{r}
sum(is.na(Hitters$Salary))

Hitters <- drop_na(Hitters, Salary)
dim(Hitters)
```

```{r}
regfit_full <- regsubsets(Salary~., Hitters)
summary(regfit_full)
```
